titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Census of Washtenaw County, Michigan

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: Schedule 1. Inhabitants (bound in 3 v.). Vol. 1. Ann Arbor, Augusta, Bridgewater, Dexter, Freedom, Lima, Lodi, Lyndon, Manchester, Manchester village, Northfield, Pittsfield -- v. 2. Salem, Saline, Saline village, Scio, Delhi village, Dexter village, Sharon, Superior, Sylvan (and Chelsea village), Webster, York, Ypsilanti -- v. 3. Ann Arbor city, Ypsilanti city

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: Schedule 3. Statistics of Agriculture. Ann Arbor, Augusta, Bridgewater, Dexter, Freedom, Lima, Lodi, Lyndon, Manchester, Manchester village, Northfield, Pittsfield, Salem, Saline, Saline village, Scio, Dexter village, Sharon, Superior, Sylvan, Chelsea village, Webster, York, Milan village, Mooreville, Ypsilanti, Ann Arbor city, Ypsilanti city

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: Schedule 4. Products of industry. Ann Arbor, Augusta, Dexter, Freedom, Lima, Lodi, Lyndon,Manchester village, Northfield, Pittsfield, Salem, Saline, Dexter village, Sharon, Superior, Sylvan, Chelsea village, Webster, Milan village, Ypsilanti, Ann Arbor city, Ypsilanti city

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: Schedule 5. Libraries and churches (bound with Schedule 4). Augusta, Bridgewater, Dexter, Freedom, Lima, Lodi, Lyndon, Manchester, Manchester village, Northfield, Pittsfield, Salem, Saline, Scio, Dexter village, Sharon, Superior, Sylvan, Webster, York, Ypsilanti, Ann Arbor city, Ypsilanti city
